name: X-PASS
description: X-PASS is an integrated digital platform built on NFT and blockchain technology, connecting the performing arts, fandom, metaverse, and travel industries. It addresses key issues in traditional ticketing systems such as server overload, ticket scalping, and duplication by incorporating NFT and Soulbound Token (SBT) technology to create fraud-proof digital tickets. This ensures secure and transparent transactions while preventing ticket loss and unauthorized duplication. Beyond providing access to performances, these NFT tickets also allow users to enjoy various additional services such as travel packages. X-PASS aims to build a new fandom community and metaverse space, enabling fans and creators to interact continuously even after events. This fosters deeper engagement and a sense of belonging for fans, while creators can maintain close relationships with their audiences and generate new value. By leveraging the innovative potential of blockchain technology, X-PASS introduces a new paradigm for the performing arts industry. Through the integration of NFTs, the metaverse, and fandom culture, it delivers a unique and immersive experience, offering rich content and services across various industries.
